# Go+BoringCrypto conflicts with GOFIPS140.
[GOEXPERIMENT:boringcrypto] skip

# list with GOFIPS140=off
env GOFIPS140=off
golang list -f '{{.DefaultGODEBUG}}'
! stdout fips140

# list with GOFIPS140=latest
env GOFIPS140=latest
golang list -f '{{.DefaultGODEBUG}}'
stdout fips140=on

[short] skip

# build with GOFIPS140=off is cached
env GOFIPS140=off
golang build -x -o x.exe
! stderr .-fipso
golang build -x -o x.exe
! stderr link

# build with GOFIPS140=latest is cached too
env GOFIPS140=latest
golang build -x -o x.exe
stderr link.*-fipso
golang build -x -o x.exe
! stderr link.*-fipso

# build test with GOFIPS140=off is cached
env GOFIPS140=off
golang test -x -c
! stderr .-fipso
golang test -x -c
! stderr link

# build test with GOFIPS140=latest is cached
env GOFIPS140=latest
golang test -x -c
stderr link.*-fipso
golang test -x -c
! stderr link

}

package main
